data_maturity_score.evidence: Strong modern data stack (AWS, orchestration tools, CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes), infrastructure-as-code, and data quality testing mentioned, indicating defined processes with modern tooling

data_maturity_level.evidence: Score of 3 indicates documented processes, modern tools, and some governance practices like data security measures and compliance

maturity_signals.evidence: AWS platform, orchestration tools (Dagster/Airflow), CI/CD pipelines, Docker/Kubernetes, infrastructure-as-code, and data quality validation strategies explicitly mentioned

scope_creep_score.evidence: Well-defined data engineering role focused on pipelines, orchestration, and infrastructure. No mention of backend development, ML engineering, or DevOps responsibilities

overtime_risk_score.evidence: Hybrid work model with flexibility mentioned, collaborative environment emphasized, but no specific work-life balance policies or overtime warnings stated

role_clarity.evidence: Focused data engineering responsibilities clearly outlined: data pipelines, orchestration, storage infrastructure, monitoring, and quality validation

overall_red_flag_score.evidence: Low overall risk - well-defined role, established company, comprehensive benefits, no scope creep indicators

reporting_structure_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'Core Engineering Data Team' but no specific reporting structure or manager level mentioned in job description

manager_level_inferred.evidence: No specific manager level or reporting structure mentioned in job posting

team_growth_velocity.evidence: Mentions contributing to formation of new team and team norms development, indicating team expansion but not aggressive hiring

value.team_size: Core Engineering Data Team (size not specified)
value.seniority_mix: Senior level role suggests experienced team

team_composition.evidence: Mentions 'Core Engineering Data Team' and contributing to team formation, but no specific team size or composition details provided

reporting_structure.evidence: No reporting structure mentioned in job description

cross_functional_embedded.evidence: Mentions collaboration with 'analysts, engineers, product managers, and stakeholders' and working with 'producers of data across SimpliSafe'

work_life_balance_score.evidence: Hybrid work model with flexibility (2 core days in office), comprehensive benefits package, and collaborative environment mentioned

growth_opportunities_score.evidence: Mentions 'learning and growth are continuous' and opportunities to 'build, grow and thrive', but no specific learning budgets or career progression paths detailed

tech_culture_score.evidence: Modern tech stack, CI/CD practices, infrastructure-as-code, and collaborative agile environment mentioned, but limited details on engineering practices

tech_culture_signals.evidence: No specific tech culture signals like open source, tech blogs, conferences, or innovation time mentioned in job description

dev_practices_mentioned.evidence: CI/CD pipelines explicitly mentioned as requirement, and monitoring performance and reliability of data pipelines required

innovation_signals.evidence: Mentions identifying areas for improvement and working in agile environment, but no specific innovation time or R&D mentioned

tech_debt_awareness.evidence: Mentions identifying areas for improvement and implementing solutions for scalability and efficiency, indicating awareness of system optimization needs

ai_integration_level.evidence: Mentions supporting 'downstream ML, Engineering, and Product applications' but no specific ML tools or infrastructure mentioned

ml_tools_expected.evidence: No specific ML tools mentioned in job description

hiring_urgency.evidence: No urgent start dates or immediate hiring language mentioned in job posting

competition_level.evidence: Senior role in established company with competitive salary range, hybrid work model in Boston market suggests moderate competition

company_stage_inferred.evidence: SimpliSafe is described as 'leading innovator' in home security industry with established products and comprehensive benefits package

hiring_velocity.evidence: Mentions contributing to formation of new team, suggesting planned expansion rather than aggressive hiring

team_size_signals.evidence: No specific team size mentioned in job description

funding_stage_signals.evidence: Established company with comprehensive benefits, equity programs, and stable business model in home security industry

role_creation_type.evidence: Mentions contributing to formation of new team and development of team norms and charter, indicating new data team creation

strengths: Transparent compensation range ($111,800-$164,000) with equity and comprehensive benefits
Strong modern data stack (AWS, orchestration tools, CI/CD, containerization)
Hybrid work flexibility with only 2 core days in Boston office
Opportunity to help build and shape a new data team from the ground up
Cross-functional collaboration with product, engineering, and analytics teams
concerns: No specific reporting structure or manager level mentioned
Limited details on career growth and learning opportunities
New team formation means less established processes and potentially more ambiguity
No visa sponsorship mentioned - may not be immigration-friendly
best_fit_for: Senior data engineers with 4-6 years experience seeking to build data infrastructure from scratch
Engineers who thrive in collaborative, cross-functional environments
Professionals wanting to work with modern cloud-native data stack and orchestration tools
red_flags_to_probe: What is the current size and composition of the Core Engineering Data Team?
Who will this role report to and what is the management structure?
What are the specific career growth and learning opportunities available?
What is the timeline for team formation and what are the immediate priorities?
negotiation_leverage: Strong AWS and orchestration tool expertise is highly valued
Experience with data quality testing and governance can differentiate
Background in building data teams or infrastructure from scratch is valuable
summary.overall_assessment: Solid opportunity for senior data engineer at established home security company building new data team. Competitive compensation, modern tech stack, and hybrid flexibility are strong positives. Main considerations are new team formation ambiguity and limited growth opportunity details. Good fit for engineers wanting to shape data infrastructure and work cross-functionally.
